name: PeopleSoft: Do not define a recordField EFFDT or EFF_STATUS without the other
description: When EFFDT is used on a non-employee data record, the EFF_STATUS field should also be defined for the record. Do not define only one without the other.
output: This report lists all the PeopleSoft Records with either EFFDT or EFF_STATUS but not the other
rationale: As PeopleSoft generates automatically the SQL query to handle the effective date, both columns should be defined.
total: Number of PeopleSoft Records with EFFDT or EFFSTATUS
